title: Ghosts in the Machine
description: Blinded by the loss of its nodes, the Harbinger attempts to permanently upload its consciousness into the city's ancient Data-Crypts in the Core District. Stop the upload.

turns.narrative: You enter the Data-Crypt. The Harbinger's tendrils have breached the walls, physically plugging into the mainframe servers.
turns.choice_a: Hack the terminal to lock out the upload (Intelligence)
turns.consequence_a: You initiate a firewall, slowing the upload to 50%. The system spawns hostile Synthetics to stop you.
turns.choice_b: Take an axe to the servers
turns.consequence_b: You destroy a server rack. The upload slows, but you irreversibly destroy pre-Scourge historical data.

turns.narrative: A holographic projection of the original Project Lead appears. 'Let it upload. It can foresee the end of the Scourge. It just needs a larger brain.'
turns.consequence_a: The Ghost overrides the safety protocols and commands the Synthetics to kill you.
turns.choice_b: Ignore the Ghost and destroy the main neural link
turns.consequence_b: You sever the physical connection. The Ghost shrieks as the upload is aborted entirely.

turns.narrative: With the upload aborted, the tendrils violently whip around the room in a dying spasm.
turns.choice_a: Take cover behind the ruined servers
turns.consequence_a: You avoid the damage and wait for it to die down.
turns.choice_b: Charge through the whipping tendrils to grab the AI Core
turns.consequence_b: You take massive physical damage, but secure the incredibly rare Ghost AI Core before the room collapses.

upload_stopped_data_safe.description: You stopped the upload and preserved the Data-Crypt.

upload_stopped_ai_looted.description: You stopped the upload and looted the valuable Ghost AI Core.

conclusion: You stopped the upload and preserved the Data-Crypt.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with significant consequences to the district and involved factions.
